name: Egg Head (Silverbird)
overview: Egg Head has the simple task to hatch. His mother is not around, so he has to find his way around the surroundings to find the infra-red heater to artificially hatch. Egg Head is a classic flip-screen arcade adventure of the era where the protagonist moves around a maze-like area looking for objects to aid in his quest. Various nasties hare in the way on each screen and teleporters can be used to move quickly between areas. The heater has to be assembled from parts scattered all over.
